Constructor

Method Detail

startPOITrackerWithRadius

public boolean startPOITrackerWithRadius(int radiusInMeters,
                                         double refreshMargin)
Starts the POI Tracker.

Parameters:
radiusInMeters - the radius of the POI coverage area
refreshMargin - the percentage of outer coverage area which, when reached, triggers a refresh of the whole coverage area. It has to be in (0.0, 0.5), default is 0.1.
Returns:
Success/failure of starting the tracker.

stopPOITracker

public boolean stopPOITracker()
Stops the POI Tracker.

Returns:
Success/failure of stopping the tracker.

setTrackedPOIs

public void setTrackedPOIs(SKTrackablePOIType poiType,
                           java.util.List<SKTrackablePOI> poiList)
Set the tracked pois. We have to set the pois, so while navigating we will receive the ones that are close to the user position.

Parameters:
poiType -
poiList -

getTrackablePOIsOnRoute

public java.util.List<SKTrackablePOI> getTrackablePOIsOnRoute(SKPosition currentPos,
                                                              java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,SKTrackablePOI> poiMap)
Returns the list of POIs located on the current route, from the given array.

Parameters:
currentPos - the current user position
poiMap - map that has entries of type (poi id, poi)
Returns:
the list of POIs that are on the route

addWarningRulesforPoiType

public boolean addWarningRulesforPoiType(SKTrackablePOIType poiType)
Configures the audio adviser to loads warning settings for tracking a specific POI type.

Parameters:
poiType - the type of POI for which the rules will apply.

setRuleForPOIType

public void setRuleForPOIType(SKTrackablePOIType poiType,
                              SKTrackablePOIRule rule)
Sets the the rules for a specific POI type.

Parameters:
poiType - the type of trackable POI that the rule will apply to.
rule - the rule that will be used.

getRuleForPOIType

public SKTrackablePOIRule getRuleForPOIType(SKTrackablePOIType poiType)
Returns the rule used for a certain POI type in detection. For more details about rules please check the SKTrackablePOIRule's documentation.

Parameters:
poiType - the type of the rule.
Returns:
The rule that is used for this type of SKTrackablePOI in detection.

forceUpdateTrackedPOIs

public boolean forceUpdateTrackedPOIs()
Triggers the SKPOITrackerListener.onUpdatePOIsInRadius(double, double, int) instantly, even if the refreshMargin is not reached.

Returns:
true if the operation was successful, false otherwise.
